title: Join the Telegraph's Culture Conversation - a WhatsApp group for the very best in TV, film and music
text:
Got a Game of Thrones-shaped hole in your viewing schedule now your watch has ended? Has Avengers: Endgame left you with a Stark need for the next installment in Marvel's cinematic universe? Wondering which rising star is about to drop your next favourite album of all time?

Whether you're looking for binge-worthy options to Netflix and chill, a rarefied glimpse behind the silver screen or to get up close and personal with your favourite new musicians, The Telegraph has got you covered with our all new Culture Conversation WhatsApp group.

Each day you'll get the hottest tips on what to watch and listen to, bringing you the inside track on the very best TV, film and music.

We will be delivering gossip, stories and behind-the-scenes access you can't get anywhere else on the cultural moments that matter most - from the Game of Thrones prequels and Marvel’s Phase 4 to Tarantino's next mega-oeuvre and the 2019 Mercury Prize - straight to your phone.

Signing up is free and easy, just follow the steps below.

Important note - your phone number will only be used to receive Culture Conversation alerts from The Telegraph. Your phone number will not be exposed to people who use the service and will not be used for marketing purposes of any kind.
description: Got a Game of Thrones-shaped hole in your viewing schedule now your watch has ended?
